q1: Do you think this team will qualify for the next World Cup?
a1: I would think so. They usually have a strong team.
q2: Do you think they have a chance to win the next World Cup?
a2: I think they could win in the next season because they are very good team and they have good players
q3: Belgium can not win the cup. They choke under pressure.
a3: I agree, Belgium will not win the next world cup.
q4: What do you think Belgium needs to change to be able to win?
a4: I feel that they must have a better defense
q5: Has Belgium ever beat any past World Cup champs?
a5: Yes, they beat both England and Brazil in the last World Cup.
